codex.form.ssc_xu_addon.familiar_fox_pur:
‘The unstable holy golden apple seems unable to dispel the curse from your body,
The curse afflicting you is far more stubborn than imagined.
However, fortunately, it has purged the witch’s magic from you.’
Yet, the physical alterations made by the witch’s magic cannot be reverted.

Exclusive trinkets/tools：[Mana Boost Bracelet]

You appear largely identical to an ordinary wild red fox—except for the two large tails swaying unusually behind you.
Your eyes are now unmistakably those of a wild animal. In sunlight, your pupils contract into narrow slits.
You realize the nature of the magic within you has completely changed. The witch’s mana has been purged, and the abilities it granted vanished along with it.
Your body is now filled with a special type of mana. The potency of your abilities is proportional to the amount of this special mana.
Blue-green flames occasionally manifest around your body before slowly fading. It seems your new mana is affecting your surroundings.

It appears this will be your new life from now on.

New mana surges within you. You have fully mastered how to utilize your mana reserves...
Your mana attaches to your weapon when attacking, consuming mana proportionally to deal additional damage.
Your mana forms a protective shield around you, granting extra armor and consuming mana when injured to mitigate part of the damage.
Your mana protects you from fire damage. While in fire or lava, your mana will be continuously consumed to maintain this effect.
Your mana allows you to consume it when hungry to restore satiety.
You can restore mana by defeating mobs or consuming golden food.
Your mana mildly repels other magics; Instant Health and Instant Damage effects are reduced to 1/4 effectiveness.
Your running speed is increased. Due to your size, ranged attacks also have difficulty hitting you.
You can now stack up to 8 identical potions.
When your mana is above 1/2, upon taking fatal damage, consume mana to avoid death.
Thanks to your thick fur, you can move freely through sweet berry bushes.

All your power is derived from mana; you must maintain a sufficient mana reserve at all times:
When your mana is completely depleted, you enter Exhaustion Mode.
While in Exhaustion Mode, you gain Weakness and Slowness effects, your hunger consumption quadruples, and you take continuous damage.
While in Exhaustion Mode, most of your mana skills cannot be used due to lack of mana.
When your mana recovers to 1/5, you exit Exhaustion Mode.

Due to heavy reliance on mana, your physical strength is relatively weak.
Since you have expelled the witch’s mana, illagers will now be hostile toward you.

You have less health. Without hands capable of freely using tools, your block-breaking speed is also slower.
Leggings and boots no longer suit your quadrupedal body structure, and your movement speed in water is reduced.

Press the Active Ability (2) key to toggle mana intensity. Higher intensity increases your power but also raises consumption.
Fox Fireball: While holding a stick, consume a small amount of mana. Press the right-click button to fire a straight-traveling fireball, dealing damage and igniting the target.
Fox Fireball EX: While holding a talisman, consume a large amount of mana. Press the right-click button to fire a straight-traveling fireball, dealing heavy damage and causing a large explosion (does not destroy blocks).
Fox Fire Arrow: While holding an arrow, consume a moderate amount of mana. Press the right-click button to fire a straight-traveling fire arrow, dealing heavy damage and igniting the target.
Fox Fire Ring: Press the Active Ability (1) key, consume a large amount of mana to release a ring of fire that slowly expands from your center, dealing damage, knocking back, and igniting targets within range.
message.ssc_xu_addon.item.unstable_holy_: The Unstable Holy Golden Apple has produced a special reaction with your form; you have transformed into a new form.
You are fortunate. Before your curse could affect the Holy Golden Apple, its magic restored your original form. However, the curse remains unbroken and continues to affect you.
Your curse caused the Unstable Holy Golden Apple's magic to become even more volatile. It exploded violently in your hands. Perhaps a stable Holy Apple could restore your form?
message.ssc_xu_addon.item.stable_holy_ap: The Holy Golden Apple's magic has restored your form, but the curse remains unbroken and continues to affect you.
item.ssc_xu_addon.mana_boost_bracelet.to: [Familiar Fox Purify Form] Increases your mana capacity and mana regeneration.
